score: 2 out of 5 people found the following review useful
review: Election was a horrible movie.  Alexander Payne made a movie a couple of years before called Citizen Ruth (with Laura Dern) and that was a hilarious piece of entertainment.  Election not only could not live up to this but it is rather childish in my view; the main issue that all of the central characters face is a high school student body presidential election.  They have nothing better to do in their time?
